meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of the <radical>cow</radical> tribe is too important to deal with small <kanji>matter</kanji>s and trivial <kanji>affair</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: All of his <kanji>affair</kanji>s are taken care of by <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai, who he hired as his underling.
